_header: I cannot stay my hasty pen
_description: The lost Rose, a lover’s lament, c. 1550 — nine quatrains (abab) lacking opening words

BodVetElc65.First Lines:
[I canno]t staye my hastye pen[B]ut that yt will declareThe
                    greeffe my harte onceived thenWhen flowers waxed bare…
BodVetElc65.Last Lines:
…Then shall we rest with Rose in ioyefor ever with the
                    Lord
